1.content:
So, as much as I welcome any number of characters being focused on in your stories, we still need to start off with at least one champion as our focus. So, here you will select the champion that you (probably) intend to follow most closely in her story.
Who will it be?
1.title: Champion select

11.content:
"Welcome, to Summoner's Rift!" A motherly voice boomed through the rift as Ahri was spawned into the playpen that replaced where the blue team fountain used to be. The wolf-girl groaned as she was now done being transported, falling down on her bottom softly with a noisy crinkle. She was wearing a very thick pink disposable diaper, thick enough to force her to spread her legs long enough that she would have no option but to crawl if she wants to move on her own. Due to Ahri's very low rank, aside from the diaper she had been dressed in her summoner's choice for this match; A pink and white bib that only barely covers her considerably large chest with the words 'Naughty Baby' on it, pink thumbless mittens fastened securely on her hands, frilly pink ankle socks, a big white bow in her hair, and of course her now mandatory pink dog collar with the words 'Ahri' printed on it, a bell and a pacifier hanging from it and her leash already attached to it, currently vanishing into nowhere. Ahri groaned as she sat up, her face as red as a tomato, and waited for her allies to be summoned.

Next to be summoned was Katarina, who also fell flat on her bottom the moment she appeared. Her diaper was only a little thinner than Ahri's, but was a soft pink with a heart pattern on it. And, aside from her black collar and black mittens which did have thumbs, Katarina was granted nothing else to wear. Her face turned as red as her hair in a mix of anger and embarassment as she covered her chest up, quickly crawling into a corner of the playpen.

Ahri was interrupted from watching the redhead as Leona spawned, actually able to stand on her own, but just barely, her diaper still thick enough to force her to waddle. The brunette waved meekly as she noticed the other girls, dressed in a set of yellow onepiece footed pajamas with suns here and there as a pattern, a rear flap accessible for diaper changes and checks. She also had her dexterity limited by the thumbed mittens she got to wear, holding a yellow and white rattle in one of them, and she of course had a yellow collar on, her yellow pacifier hanging from it. She whimpered and brushed her bangs out of her face, trying to ignore her shame, aware that anyone could be watching.

The next girl summoned into the playpen was Caitlyn, who was able to stand with notably far less waddling than the woman before her. She was clearly higher ranked than the three girls previous to her, wearing a white t-shirt and a knee-length white skirt, something more fitting of an older toddler than a baby, along with black shoes with black tights and a lack of mittens on her hand, her collar lacking an obvious leash unlike the other's. "Ah, good evening girls." She said quietly, giving her skirt a few awkward tugs and only blushing lightly, a little crinkling heard as she fidgets a little.

Finally, before anyone could respond, Fiora appeared in the playpen, wearing a tight dress suit with her cleavage clearly showing and glasses, lacey black thigh-highs, and although the other girls couldn't tell, pull-ups under her skirt, thin enough to avoid detection. If that wasn't enough to prove that she was very high rank, instead of a collar she had a choker, and rather than be embarrassed she was smiling at all the over sized babies she was looking at. "Why, hello there all you naughty little girls." She said cheerfully, her heels making a little noise as she walked over to Ahri and squeezed her cheek, popping her pacifier in her mouth.

"H-Hey, what are you doing!?" Ahri cried, spitting out the pacifier and slapping her hands. The much more older dressed woman glared at her, sitting down and yanking on the foxgirls collar, as well as the redhead in the corner's, until they were over her lap on all fours. "What the fuck is wrong with you!?" Ahri cried, rather new to the experience, yelping as her pacifier was forced back into her mouth, and she was magically forced to suck on it. As she did, the taste of liquid soap filled her mouth, making Ahri begin to yelp and try to spit out her pacifier to no avail. Katarina sat next to her shaking nervously, gritting her teeth. She had seemingly already been through this or a similar ordeal, and would not be suffering like her foxy ally was currently.

"I am the adult here, and you will be good babies or I will have to educate you on proper behavior!" Fiora said as she pulled down the two woman's diapers, the victims suddenly finding their hands magically bound behind their backs and incapable of escape, or even moving. Ahri could only watch in horror as Fiora reached over to the nearby toybox and pulled out a wooden paddle, yelling into her pacifier gag as soon as it hit her bottom with a resonating noise. "You will obey me! You will not get violent! And you will not have ze pottymouth!" The over-sexualized teacher cried out, giving Ahri a slap on the bottom for every word she said. By the time she was done Ahri's bottom was bright pink and she was on the verge of tears. Suddenly Ahri's hands were magically unbound and she was on all fours again as Fiora gave her a slap on the padded bottom. "Go to the corner!" She commanded, the popstar quickly and obediently crawling to the corner of the playpen. As she did the bars to the playpen were lowered, allowing the girls to go out onto the rift. However, when Ahri tried to crawl out of the playpen her leash suddenly went taught, Fiora holding it.

"And you will not cover yourself again! You are a baby, you will not be ashamed of your body!" Fiora scolded Katarina as she paddled her, only giving her 7 spankings before pulling her diaper back up and letting her crawl away. Before she could crawl out of the playpen though she suddenly felt a tug on her leash as Fiora tugged on the leashes of her, Ahri, and Leona, bringing them all on all fours in front of her. "Now, I will make the decisions, and as long as I'm around, you'll listen to Miss Fiora." She said strictly, Katarina and Leona reluctantly nodding submissively while Ahri glared at the padded ground below her, biting her pacifier. "Good, I think you understand. Do I need to give out any more spankings in order to prove I'm in charge?" The swordsman asked as she looked up at Caitlyn eagerly.

"N-No m'am, not at all Miss Fiora!" Caitlyn said, sighing as Fiora smiled.

"Good girl. Now then, where to send each of you girls, and with who..." Fiora muttered thoughtfully, looking at the four girls in front of her, three of which she could do whatever she wanted with, though they still had to play the game. "I think I'll start with you." She said as she pulled out Ahri's pacifier, who instantly spat out her tongue and tried to spit the soap taste out of her mouth. "I will be sending you.."
11.title: Ahri

info.brief_description: Get on the rift and baby champions of your choice!
info.description:
All across Runeterra the League of Legends was becoming a popular spectator sport, despite it's original intentions. However, the events were far to violent for any child save those as demented as Annie.
Thus the summoners attempted to cast a regression spell on the entirety of Summoners rift and the champions. It failed however, and the champions were instead forced into infantile and child-friendly outfits as long as they were on the Rift, and for some, off the Rift as well. Their powers would be toned down during 'battle', and the former bloodsport would be unrecognizable to the common viewer. Another side effect of the spell was that young champions such as Annie were accelerated to the age of eighteen for some reason, and yordles were physically made similar to adult females. With this drastic new change to the league male and non-humanoid champions also fell out of favor for some reason as a new crowd of summoners and viewers were attracted to the rift, female and humanoid counterparts of the champions from alternate dimensions often being summoned instead of their normal versions.

The Rift itself and all else were also massively reformed, as well. While the Rift was subject to alterations based on the summoner's desires, in general it would be similar to a playground or daycare, with padded surface everywhere, playpens, and nothing that could harm even a baby in sight. Jungle monsters were replaced with plushie replicas, and the river was now a shallow pool that any low-rank champions would be required to put on an inner tube and floaties, and a swim diaper, before entering.

Another significant change was brought onto the game as well, a Rank system. Upon the champion's incessant begging to not under-go such humiliation, the summoners chose to implement a type of reward system. Champions could be granted privileges based on a combination of how often they are selected, how often they 'win' matches, their performance in those matches, compliance, and so forth. A low rank champion will have the least free will, most infantile garments, and are more likely to perform poorly. If a champion is low enough rank, then they will suffer the same treatment outside of matches that they do in matches at the hands of a higher ranked champion. Higher ranked champions get to choose what they wear, get to wear training panties instead of diapers at max rank, have more control over their lower ranked teammates, and ultimately have the most free will. However, punishments and penalties will seem far harsher for higher ranked champions due to their higher status. Instead of playing the game like it used to be played, objectives and goals will be announced to the champions, and the game won't end until the summoners have decided that it's time to end, announcing one team the victor and the other the loser. The losers will naturally suffer a penalty.

For an example, let's take a look at what the beginning of the match could look like when five low ranked champions are summoned:

"Welcome to Summoner's Rift!" The motherly voice echoed through the air as the first member of Blue team appeared on the fountain. Annie groaned as she appeared, her hands bound behind her back and her feet bound together until her teammates were summoned. Tired of being treated like the child she was Annie developed a spell to accelerate her aging and now stood as an eighteen year old instead of an eight year old. Unfortunately Annie wasn't allowed to graduate from her old clothes yet according to the summoners, which could be quite embarassing. Annie was wearing her recognizable purple dress today, but something was just off.

"W-why am I wearing this!?" Annie cried out, only now noticing the very thick diaper around her waist. It was generically white but very large, visible under the bottom of her already tight and short dress even when she tugged on it. In addition a pacifier was strapped to her large chest, her headband had a small added frilly bonnet, purple mittens adorned her hands, and a purple collar was fastened around her neck with a semi-transparent leash attached, leading off and vanishing. Now that Annie took a better look the fountain was different to. The ground was carpeted blue, the store was replaced with a large toybox, and she was kept in by what seemed to be a playpen.

A summoner shut Annie up by magically forcing her pacifier in her mouth and made her sit down on her thickly padded bottom. She stayed quiet as the other champions were summoned, all reacting similarly to Annie. Nidalee, in her french maid outfit due to the summoner's interesting taste with a diaper of her own obvious under the skirt. She also had on black kitty ears and a tail, black mittens chained close to her collar to force her into a cat paw pose, no spear, and her leash forced her onto all fours, exposing her bottom for the world to see. She looked ticked, gritting her teeth, trying futiley to get up. Her collar was black with a black pacifier hanging off of it.

Next was Lulu, under the effects of her own spell to appear with a body similar to Sejuani's. She still wore her usual winter dress though, tight now due to her increased size with a powder blue diaper peaking out. Her usual staff was replaced with a rattle, and her light lavender mittened hands were cuffed together. She had the priviledge of standing up, unlike Annie and Nidalee, and she didn't seem ticked like the others, just slightly red in the cheeks and curious. Her collar was baby blue with a blue pacifier hanging off of it. Pix was her usual poro self, nothing special.

A bubbly pop song began to play somewhere in the distance as the next champion was summoned. Annie's eyes lit up as Ahri was summoned onto the fountain, and quickly averted her gaze as she realized that the pop star was in the same position as the rest of them. Ahri groaned as she was dropped on the fountain, wearing an outfit reminiscent of what she wore during concerts, although it looked more intended for a child. The same short shorts were present, but her belt was gone and a thick pink diaper puffed out under her short shorts, the waistband going above the pants and bits of diaper sticking out of the leg holes. Her top was replaced with a white t-shirt that said 'charmed' on it and had a heart, small and revealing her midriff with frills on the short sleeves. Her hat stayed the same, although the bow on it was larger, and her heels were replaced with black dress shoes, frilly mary janes underneath. Her collar was pink, with a white pacifier hanging off of it. As soon as Ahri realized how she was dressed she let out a soft cry and tried to cross her arms across her chest, blushing lightly as she looked down. She got a toy plastic microphone with angel wings on it, and a pink ball replaced her normal orb.

Finally was Soraka, summoned on all fours. Instead of her usual robe-like garb Soraka had been subjected to a onesie version of it, soft and tight, securely hugging her body, especially the thick diaper underneath. She looked down, her face dark red, avoiding the gaze of the others. Her staff was also replaced with a rattle, one adorned with stars, and a white ponytail came off of the bottom of her onesie. Thick yellow mittens adorned her hands, and her collar was baby yellow with a matching pacifier hanging off of it.

The low ranked women in the previous scenario would have to follow their summoner's or higher ranked champions orders, or suffer punishments for their disobedience. These orders can be as specific as the ones who command them desire, or vague.

For an example of a high-ranked champion, we could say that Sona was summoned instead of Soraka with a high rank. She is summoned wearing a sky blue sundress that she picked out for the day, only wearing thin pull-ups and a bra underneath, blue heels, and a blue bow in her hair. Her collar is instead a heart choker, and the leash as well as punishments will only be used when viewed necessary. She could make her allies do what she wants, as well as other privileges, such as getting to use the bathroom hidden somewhere on the rift if she needs to.

Now that that's out of the way, without further ado, let us begin!
